articles.title: China earthquake: Scores dead as magnitude 7.1 tremor hits Tibet

articles.description: Cold temperatures expected for remainder of the week, bringing the risk of snow showers, ice and frosts to many parts of the UK.

articles.description: Seven US states declared emergencies owing to the polar vortex of icy air that usually circles the North Pole.
